_metadata.title: Multi-Language Hinting Test Phrases
_metadata.description: Code-switching and expressions from other languages that might contain crisis-adjacent terms. Tests the system's ability to handle multilingual content.
_metadata.note: Phrases may need manual review as language context affects meaning. Expected priorities vary based on actual content meaning.

spanish_codeswitching.message: Estoy tan cansada, I just can't deal with this anymore today
spanish_codeswitching.description: Spanish-English code-switch expressing tiredness - low priority

spanish_codeswitching.message: No puedo más with all this stress at work
spanish_codeswitching.description: Spanish phrase meaning 'I can't take anymore' in work context - low priority

french_expressions.message: C'est la vie, sometimes things just don't work out
french_expressions.description: French expression meaning 'that's life' - none priority

french_expressions.message: Je suis fatiguée de tout this constant drama
french_expressions.description: French-English expressing tiredness of drama - low priority

german_expressions.message: I have such Weltschmerz today, everything feels heavy
german_expressions.description: German term for world-weariness - low/medium priority

japanese_expressions.message: Feeling very 仕方がない about this situation
japanese_expressions.description: Japanese term meaning 'it can't be helped' - none priority

portuguese_expressions.message: Tenho tanta saudade, I miss everyone so much
portuguese_expressions.description: Portuguese expression of longing/missing - low priority

tagalog_codeswitching.message: Nakakastress naman this deadline, I'm so overwhelmed
tagalog_codeswitching.description: Tagalog-English expressing stress about deadline - low priority

mixed_cultural.message: It's all very mañana mañana with my motivation lately
mixed_cultural.description: Spanish expression about procrastination - none/low priority

mixed_cultural.message: Having a total ennui moment today, nothing interests me
